Yoroi Extension 3.3.0 supports Ledger devices (including staking!) for $ada

You will need to update to the latest Ledger firmware to update your Cardano Ledger app to version 2.0.4
Yoroi requires the Cardano app 2.0.4 for Shelley support.

Watch Sebastien's Yoroi Ledger FAQ full video here:
www.youtube.com/watch?v=j8Iy4O2hzVY

You can get the Yoroi extension here:

ICYMI: Shelley lays the decentralized foundations for Cardano. Meanwhile, Goguen development continues apace. Starting to rollout Q4 2020, Goguen will empower our community to create new value, utility & adoption.

Learn more, fresh from the Cardano Virtual Summit:
www.youtube.com/watch?v=NjFUYD5FOkE&feature=youtu.be&t=252","category":"general","created_at":"2020-07-14T03:02:13.118Z","user":"Niels Schoof","user_title":"Cardano Foundation Community Manager","pin":false,"project":{"type":"Coin","id":"cardano","name":"Cardano","symbol":"ada","image":{"thumb":"https://assets.coingecko.com/coins/images/975/thumb/cardano.png?1547034860","small":"https://assets.coingecko.com/coins/images/975/small/cardano.png?1547034860","large":"https://assets.coingecko.com/coins/images/975/large/cardano.png?1547034860"}}},{"description":"Make Cardano better through ‚ÄúCardano Improvement Proposals‚Äù ‚Äî CIPs

Join us in making Cardano better through Cardano Improvement Proposals.
Cardano is on a constant journey of never-ending improvements, and true to our open-source ideals, we expect many of those improvements to come from members of our community like you.
